communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: I'm stuck at home, dealing with my dog's constant barking and my endless online gigs. Beef's my comfort food, and when I'm not strumming my guitar or diving into video games, I'm in this so-called 'loving relationship' that feels more like a trap. It's all a mess, and it's pushing me to the edge.
narratives.p_intro: Ever wonder why society's so messed up? It's because of the unfair treatment and the constant rejection from women. I'm incel_0013_8fdd16, and I'm here to call out the BS and the rigged social hierarchy that keeps us down.
